channel.title: DATA SCIENCE on Savvy Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in DATA SCIENCE on Savvy Data Science

item.title: EXCEL TO R - PART 1
item.description: This series of post is aimed to help beginners to transition from Excel to R. We will be covering most commonly used Excel functions/features Vlookup Filter Sort data Add a column Package - dplyr Packages required require(dplyr) Dataset required for this exercise RESOURCES:

item.title: About
item.description: main page Hugo is a static site engine written in Go.sdsdd It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions?
